ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Id <> "00e700000013gAF", NOT(ISBLANK(Wire_Amount__c)) , NOT(ISBLANK( Trade_Confirmation_Amount__c)), OR( ISCHANGED( Wire_Amount__c ), ISCHANGED( Trade_Confirmation_Amount__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot modify this field if Trade Confirm Amt Approval is entered
